A

addCommand(Command) - Method in class by.zti.main.scanner.ConsoleScanner
This method should be used to add new Command instance to scanner.

C

Command - Class in by.zti.main.scanner
This class represents a typical command for ConsoleScanner to work with.
Command(String, String) - Constructor for class by.zti.main.scanner.Command
Allocates new Command object that contains given name and description as it's parameters.
ConsoleScanner - Class in by.zti.main.scanner
This is a utility class that allows it's instances to read input stream of system console and execute particular code associated with different commands depending on the input of the stream.
ConsoleScanner(String, String) - Constructor for class by.zti.main.scanner.ConsoleScanner
Allocates new ConsoleScanner object that contains all data necessary to popper reading of system input.
ConsoleScanner(String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class by.zti.main.scanner.ConsoleScanner
Allocates new ConsoleScanner object that contains all data necessary to popper reading of system input.
Consumable - Interface in by.zti.main.scanner
This is the interface to use in order to create logic for your scanner.
consume(Map<String, List<String>>) - Method in interface by.zti.main.scanner.Consumable
Interface method to be called from command instance for executing logic.
